title: The Cossack Hero in Russian Literature: A Study in Cultural Mythology
description: This is the first book to study the development of the Cossack hero and to identify him as part of Russian cultural mythology. Kornblatt explores the power of the myth as a literary image, providing new and challenging readings of Pushkin, Gogol, Tolstoi, and a host of other writers.
author: Judith Deutsch Kornblatt
